ObjTextEntries.textEntry: Brass plaque on frame: Public Works of Art Project

Depicts a young, dark haired women wearing a green v-neck dress and playing with two black cats.

Condition:  The painting has a repaired tear approximately 3 inches in length across the neck and into the cheek of the female; a 12 inch vertical repaired tear extending from the lower foreground extending up to the woman's knee just below the cat on her lap, visible to the nake eye; minor areas of pigment craquelure to the sitter's forehead and right of face in the pale yellow mountains.  Otherwise very good.  The frame is loose at the joints and has minor nicks.
Signed and dated lower right:  Don R. Smith 1934; initialed in blue on the reverse of stretcher-CW; marked in red on reverse of frame and stretcher; &quot;23&quot; within a circle
